resources.string: Good job! You won this game!
Oops! You lost this game. Try again!
Pick your preferred level for this game:

Thanks for stopping by! This application was created by Infinitum Industries. Copyright 2018. 

Scoring methodologies: 
For Minesweeper, the score of the player is determined as a ratio of the number of mines to the total elapsed time of the game, with a level multiplier applied. The multiplier is 1 for easy, 2 for medium, and 3 for hard. The 3BV score of the board has not been calculated.
When you\'re ready, press "Start Game" to begin.
X won the game! Good job X\'ers!
O won the game! Good job O\'ers!
You also got a top score! Enter your name here to be added to the leaderboard:
